name: Meters Below the Ground
description:
Meters Below the Ground is a short tactical dungeon-crawler about escaping from an insectoid-infested facility. Complete objectives to unlock more meters for your character so you might stand a chance against the alien threat.

Features:

  • Procedurally generated levels
  • 10 different types of meter
  • Alien insect lifecycles
  • 4 different mission types
  • Runs in a browser
  • Gorgeously-rendered ascii unicode graphics
  • Unix terminal support (linux and macos-non-app only)
